Rulings.Goat:
●Discarding 1 card from your hand is a cost.

●If Ring of Destruction is chained to Dark Core, and destroys the monster targeted by Dark Core, then the effect of Dark Core disappears.

Rulings.Base: 1. Discarding 1 card from your hand is a cost.\n2. This card targets. The target of "Dark Core" is selected at activation of "Dark Core".\n3. If "Ring of Destruction" is chained to "Dark Core", and destroys the monster targeted by "Dark Core", then the effect of "Dark Core" disappears.
